response.overview: A story about young people in Kharkiv who cannot imagine their lives without skateboards, even after February 24, 2022. They are aware of the risks, but are not ready to move to other cities because here, at home, at least there is a place to skate and hang out with like-minded people who are just as crazy.
response.title: Скейтбординг на лінії фронту
